overview:
He is noted for his passionate enthusiasm in his field of Building Efficient Controls

He speaks some European languages.

His work team generally come to work with him the old-fashioned way on a handshake and because of mutual interest. He does not tolerate dishonesty from colleagues or friends environment and believes in an open approach.

He makes mistakes and often starts slowly because of them, but once he learns something it sticks. He tolerates mistakes in others, and is fiercely loyal when things go wrong, and tries to judges on decisions made rather than outcomes.
